post:
Hello i have a Ramnode VPS with 120 GB space, and 512 MB ram and 512 MB swap with 2 TB per month traffic allowed. It expires on 20/12/2014. I got it for 54.27 Dollars recurring.

I want to exchange it for 1 year cpanel hosting account which can host my dynamic wordpress or for 18 dollars.

Reason: I really need cpanel hosting and have absolutely no money to get some reliable hosting and i do not want to setup LAMP or nginx on my own on a VPS. 

Anyone can help me?
